statusDetails.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 401: Unauthorized

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": 102
}
Body: {"empPicture":null,"employeeId":"0529","firstName":"mohammad","lastName":"mohammad","middleName":"OK"}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 401 - Unauthorized
Headers: {
  "server": "nginx",
  "date": "Sat, 21 Oct 2023 11:07:38 GMT",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "transfer-encoding": "chunked",
  "connection": "keep-alive",
  "set-cookie": [
    "orangehrm=f93b1ae737a5428e1a2ffe8f4d688cd4; path=/web; secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=Strict"
  ],
  "cache-control": "no-cache, private",
  "x-content-type-options": "nosniff",
  "x-xss-protection": "1; mode=block"
}
Body: {
  "error": {
    "status": 401,
    "message": "Session expired"
  }
}
